comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: 200412011139

After pasting a stack trace into the stacktrace console i for an index out of
bounds exception.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Enter a valid stacktrace into the stack trace view
2. Exit eclipse
3. Open the stack trace console again
4. Select all and Paste a new stack trace over the existing one
5. hover over the top hyperlinks (should get a strange presentation, see screenshot)

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Index out of bounds
